page.title: 13EMPLOYMENT.
page.content: {EMPLOYMENT IN OUR AREA. Nearly everybody in our area is employed,about a quarter of those work for themselves,the rest work for someone else.Most people work locally and have been employed for a number of years.The occupations are varied from nurses to builders and scientists and in most cases require skilled workers. Not many work part-time and nearly all who work liked their job. Again not many thought they would get another.The greatest fears for the future were nuclear war,unemployment, violence. The greatest hopes for the future were peace,more pay,more employment for all and a better world for future generations.Most people get to work using their own car, quite a lot use the firms car,few use bicycles public transport and motor bikes,some walked.
